title: Jennifer Westacott AC - KPMG Australia | LinkedIn
snippet: The Business Council of Australia is the nation’s premier business organisation… · Experience: KPMG Australia · Education: UNSW · Location: Sydney · 500+ connections on LinkedIn. View Jennifer Westacott AC’s profile on LinkedIn, a professional community of 1 billion members.

title: Jennifer Westacott AC rejoins KPMG to champion inclusion and innovation
snippet: Almost 12 months after rejoining KPMG Australia, the former Business Council of Australia CEO was made a Companion of the Order of Australia (AC) – the nation’s highest civilian accolade. It was formal recognition of her outstanding contributions to business, education, public policy and community development – all of which have been driven by her passion for driving success through inclusivity. "A key part of my role here at KPMG Australia is to ensure our workplace is a beacon of equity...

title: Jennifer Westacott - Business Council of Australia
snippet: As a senior partner at KPMG, Jennifer advised major corporations on climate change and sustainability and advised governments across Australia on significant reform priorities.

title: Jennifer Westacott | BoardLinks
snippet: From 2005 to 2011 Jennifer was senior partner at KPMG, heading up the firm’s Sustainability, Climate Change and Water practice and its NSW State Government practice.

title: KPMG announces three senior appointments | Media release
snippet: 3 July 2025 – David Bradbury, Jennifer Westacott AO and Michael Ebeid AM join KPMG Australia.
